import_descriptive.title: Attribute Importer
import_descriptive.description:
File Benötigt:
  • id: Feature iD
  • locale: Feature locale
  • title: Feature title
  • description: Feature description

import_descriptive.title: Connect Products with Features
import_descriptive.description:
File Benötigt:
  • id: product_feature id
  • product id
  • feature id
  • feature_av_id
  • free_text_value

import_descriptive.title: Import Full Product
import_descriptive.description:
Importer.2 supports the following structure:
Produkt_id, Extern_id, Ref, Marke_id, Kategorie_id, Template_id, Produkt_titel, Kurze_beschreibung, Beschreibung, Postscriptum, Meta_titel, Meta_beschreibung, Meta_keywords, Menge, Ist_in_Angebot, Ist_neu, Gewicht, EAN_code, Bild_name, Bild_titel, Bild_beschreibung, Bild_kurz_beschreibung, Bild_postscriptum, Bild_file, Price, Promo_price, Listen_price, Ek_preis_sht, Ek_preis_gc, Ek_preis_oag, Ek_preis_holter, Preis_reuter, Vergleich_ek, Aufschlag
Indications:
  • Decimal numbers must use "." as separator : 12.34
  • Values are always numbers(even constraint values)
  • "False" and "true" must be replaced with 0 and 1

import_descriptive.title: Gesamte Produkten importieren
import_descriptive.description:
Importer.2 supports the following structure:
Produkt_id, Extern_id, Ref, Marke_id, Kategorie_id, Template_id, Produkt_titel, Kurz_beschreibung, Beschreibung, Postscriptum, Meta_titel, Meta_beschreibung, Meta_keywords, Menge, Ist_in_Angebot, Ist_neu, Gewicht, EAN_code, Bild_name, Bild_titel, Bild_beschreibung, Bild_kurz_beschreibung, Bild_postscriptum, Price, Promo_price, Listen_price, Ek_preis_sht, Ek_preis_gc, Ek_preis_oag, Ek_preis_holter, Preis_reuter, Vergleich_ek, Aufschlag
Indications:
  • Decimal numbers must use "." as separator : 12.34
  • Values are always numbers(even constraint vales)
  • "False" and "true" must be replaced with 0 and 1

import_descriptive.title: Import ek prices excluding taxes
import_descriptive.description:
Your file must have the following columns:
  • id: The id of your product sale elements
  • price: The price excluding taxes of the product attribute combinations

import_descriptive.title: Preis importieren
import_descriptive.description:
Your file must have the following columns:
  • id: The id of your product sale elements
  • price: The price excluding taxes of the product attribute combinations
  • ek_price_sht
  • ek_price_gc

export_descriptive.title: PreisRoboter Product Catalog Export
export_descriptive.description:
Export the Product Catalog in the required PreisRoboter CSV format:
  • Artikelnummer,EAN,Herstellerartikelnummern
  • Marke/Anbieter,Produktname
  • Preis,Spezialpreis,Streichpreis,Promo
  • Produkt_URL,Produkt_BILD,Produktgruppe
